issue.title: Tasks required before moving to standard Python packages

content.raw:
FYI: I figured out today how to automate the publishing of packages to PyPI using GitHub actions. You can check out the github workflow and setup.py files for the [autoscrub](https://github.com/philipstarkey/autoscrub) project Russ and I made. It automatically publishes every version to Test PyPI, and tagged versions to real PyPI.

‌
